nav.mobileMenuDescription: Navigate to app sections and settings from this menu.
nav.commandMenuDescription: Type a command or search for papers, projects, and groups.

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to your Paper Scraper account
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.forgotPasswordFailed: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
auth.resetEmailSent: If an account exists with {{email}}, we've sent a password reset link.
auth.resetEmailExpiry: The link will expire in 1 hour. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.resetPasswordFailed: Failed to reset password. The link may have expired.
auth.resetPasswordSuccessDescription: Your password has been reset. You can now sign in with your new password.
auth.invalidLinkDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
auth.verifyingEmailDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address.
auth.verificationFailed: Verification failed. The link may have expired.
auth.emailVerifiedDescription: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now use all features of Paper Scraper.
auth.verificationFailedHint: If your link has expired, you can request a new verification email from your account settings.
auth.invitationExpired: This invitation is invalid or has expired.
auth.acceptInvitationFailed: Failed to accept invitation. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Here's what's happening with your research pipeline

papers.title: Papers
papers.subtitle: Manage your research paper library
papers.importDescription: Import papers by DOI, OpenAlex, PubMed, arXiv, or PDF upload.
papers.searchPlaceholder: Search papers by title or abstract...
papers.noPapersDescription: Import your first paper to get started.
papers.noPapersStartDescription: Start building your research library by importing papers from various sources.
papers.noSearchResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search terms or clear the filter to see all papers.
papers.notScoredYet: This paper hasn't been scored yet
papers.authorsDescription: Click on an author to view profile and log contacts
papers.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this paper?
papers.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this paper? This action cannot be undone.
papers.generateEmbedding: Generate embedding to find similar papers
papers.relatedPatentsDescription: Patents found via EPO Open Patent Services
papers.citationGraphDescription: Citations and references via Semantic Scholar
papers.simplifiedDescription: AI-generated simplified version for general audiences
papers.loadFailed: Failed to load papers. Please try again.
papers.importDoiFailed: Failed to import paper. Check the DOI and try again.
papers.importOpenAlexFailed: Failed to import from OpenAlex. Please try again.
papers.importPubMedFailed: Failed to import from PubMed. Please try again.
papers.importArxivFailed: Failed to import from arXiv. Please try again.
papers.pdfUploadFailed: Failed to upload PDF. Please try again.
papers.invalidPdfFile: Please select a valid PDF file.
papers.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {{size}}MB.
papers.doiDescription: Enter a DOI to import a single paper
papers.openAlexDescription: Search OpenAlex for papers matching your query
papers.pubmedDescription: Use PubMed search syntax for best results
papers.pdfDropzone: Click to select a PDF file or drag and drop

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive email updates about your papers and alerts
settings.passwordSubtitle: Change your password to keep your account secure
settings.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

search.title: Search
search.subtitle: Find papers using full-text, semantic, or hybrid search
search.noResultsDescription: No papers match "{{query}}". Try different keywords or switch to semantic search for broader results.
search.startSearchingDescription: Enter keywords to find papers in your library. Use semantic search to discover papers by meaning, not just keywords.
search.radarChartOverlay: Radar chart overlay of selected papers
search.noScoresForComparison: No papers with scores available for comparison

savedSearches.title: Saved Searches
savedSearches.subtitle: Manage your saved search queries and alerts
savedSearches.loadFailed: Failed to load saved searches. Please try again.
savedSearches.noSavedSearchesDescription: Save a search from the search page to get started
savedSearches.shareLinkDescription: Share this link to allow others to view and run this saved search.

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.subtitle: Monitor your saved searches and get notified of new papers
alerts.loadFailed: Failed to load alerts. Please try again.
alerts.noAlertsDescription: Create an alert from a saved search to get notified of new papers
alerts.noResults: No results yet. This alert has not been triggered.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Organize papers into projects with KanBan pipelines
projects.createDescription: Create a new project to organize your papers
projects.loadFailed: Failed to load projects. Please try again.
projects.noProjectsDescription: Create your first project to start organizing papers into pipelines.
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the project "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
projects.noPapersInProjectDescription: Add papers from your library to this project to start organizing them.

groups.title: Researcher Groups
groups.subtitle: Organize researchers into groups for collaboration
groups.loadFailed: Failed to load groups. Please try again.
groups.noGroupsDescription: Create your first group to start organizing researchers.
groups.selectGroup: Select a group to view details
groups.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
groups.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove "{{name}}" from this group?
groups.memberRemovedDescription: "{{name}}" has been removed from the group.
groups.exportCompleteDescription: Group data has been exported to CSV.

transfer.title: Technology Transfer
transfer.subtitle: Manage technology transfer conversations and outreach
transfer.createDescription: Start a new technology transfer conversation
transfer.loadFailed: Failed to load conversations. Please try again.
transfer.noConversationsDescription: Start a new technology transfer conversation to begin outreach.
transfer.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation below.

submissions.title: Research Submissions
submissions.subtitle: Review and manage research submissions

submissions.noSubmissionsDescription: Submit your first research to get started.
submissions.selectSubmission: Select a submission to view details
submissions.submittedDescription: Your submission has been sent for review.
submissions.analysisCompleteDescription: AI analysis has been completed for this submission.
submissions.convertedDescription: The submission has been converted to a paper in your library.

orgSettings.title: Organization Settings
orgSettings.subtitle: Manage your organization's settings and configuration
orgSettings.teamManagementDescription: View and manage team members, roles, and invitations.
orgSettings.teamManagementInfo: Go to the Team page to invite new members and manage existing ones.
orgSettings.rolePermissionsDescription: View the permissions for each role in your organization.
orgSettings.updateSuccessDescription: Organization settings have been saved successfully.
orgSettings.updateFailedDescription: Failed to update organization settings. Please try again.
orgSettings.adminRequiredDescription: You need admin permissions to access organization settings.

modelSettings.title: AI Model Settings
modelSettings.subtitle: Configure AI models for scoring and analysis
modelSettings.addModelConfigDescription: Configure a new AI model for your organization
modelSettings.configuredModelsDescription: AI models available for your organization
modelSettings.noModelsDescription: Add your first AI model to start using AI scoring and analysis.
modelSettings.usageByOperationDescription: Token usage and costs broken down by operation type
modelSettings.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this model configuration? This action cannot be undone.
modelSettings.modelAddedDescription: The model has been configured successfully.
modelSettings.modelRemovedDescription: The model configuration has been deleted.

devSettings.title: Developer Settings
devSettings.subtitle: Manage API keys, webhooks, and repository sources
devSettings.createApiKeyDescription: Generate a new API key for programmatic access
devSettings.apiKeysDescription: Manage API keys for programmatic access to your organization's data
devSettings.noApiKeysDescription: Create an API key to start integrating with external services.
devSettings.copyKeyWarning: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
devSettings.apiKeyCreatedDescription: Your new API key has been generated.
devSettings.apiKeyRevokedDescription: The API key has been permanently revoked.
devSettings.revokeApiKeyDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke this API key? This action cannot be undone and any integrations using this key will stop working.
devSettings.createWebhookDescription: Set up a webhook to receive event notifications
devSettings.name: Name
devSettings.webhooksDescription: Receive notifications when events occur in your organization
devSettings.noWebhooksDescription: Create a webhook to receive event notifications.
devSettings.webhookCreatedDescription: The webhook has been configured successfully.
devSettings.deleteWebhookDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this webhook? You will no longer receive event notifications at this URL.
devSettings.addRepoSourceDescription: Configure an external repository to automatically import papers
devSettings.repoSourcesDescription: External repositories configured for automatic paper imports
devSettings.noReposDescription: Add a repository source to automatically import papers.
devSettings.repoAddedDescription: The repository source has been configured.
devSettings.repoRemovedDescription: The repository source has been deleted.
devSettings.removeRepoDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this repository source? Automatic imports from this source will stop.

team.title: Team Members
team.subtitle: Manage your organization's team members and invitations
team.inviteDialogDescription: Send an invitation to join your organization
team.pendingInvitationsDescription: Invitations that have not been accepted yet

badges.subtitle: Track your progress and earn badges for your contributions
badges.noNewBadges: No new badges to award at this time.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.subtitle: Manage knowledge sources for AI-powered analysis
knowledge.personalDescription: Add a personal knowledge source visible only to you
knowledge.noSourcesDescription: Add a knowledge source to enhance AI analysis with domain-specific context.
knowledge.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.
knowledge.createdDescription: The knowledge source has been added successfully.
knowledge.updatedDescription: The knowledge source has been updated.
knowledge.saveFailedDescription: Failed to save knowledge source. Please try again.
knowledge.deleteFailedDescription: Failed to delete knowledge source. Please try again.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Insights and metrics for your research pipeline
analytics.importTrendDescription: Papers imported over the last 30 days
analytics.papersBySourceDescription: Distribution of papers by import source
analytics.scoreDistributionDescription: Distribution of overall scores across all papers
analytics.avgScoresByDimensionDescription: Mean scores across all six innovation dimensions
analytics.importAndScorePapers: Import and score papers to see top results here.
analytics.embeddingCoverageDescription: Percentage of papers with generated embeddings for semantic search
analytics.innovationFunnelDescription: Track papers through your innovation pipeline stages
analytics.noFunnelDataDescription: Create projects and add papers to see funnel analytics.
analytics.conversionRatesDescription: Stage-to-stage conversion rates in your pipeline
analytics.createScheduledReportDescription: Set up automated reports delivered to your inbox
analytics.scheduledReportsDescription: Automated reports delivered on a regular schedule
analytics.noScheduledReportsDescription: Create a scheduled report to receive automated insights.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Stay up to date with your research pipeline activity
notifications.noNotificationsDescription: You'll receive notifications when alerts trigger or badges are earned.
notifications.setupAlertsHint: Set up alerts to get notified about new papers.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.subtitle: Monitor compliance, audit trails, and data governance
compliance.noAuditLogsDescription: Audit logs will appear here as users perform actions.
compliance.retentionPoliciesDescription: Configure how long data is retained before cleanup
compliance.noPoliciesDescription: Create retention policies to manage data lifecycle.
compliance.deletePolicyDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the retention policy for {{entity}}? This action cannot be undone.
compliance.applyPoliciesDescription: This will permanently delete data matching your retention policies. This action cannot be undone.
compliance.dryRunComplete: Dry run complete: {{count}} records would be affected
